guard.text: Name a non-Guard card and choose a player.  If that player has that card, he or she is out of the round.

baron.text: You and another player secretly compare hands.  The player with the lower value is out of the round.

handmaiden.text: Until your next turn, ignore all effects from other players' cards.

prince.text: Choose any player (including yourself) to discard his or her hand and draw a new card.

king.text: Trade hands with another player of your choice.

countess.text: If you have this card and the King or Prince in your hand, you must discard this card.

princess.text: If you discard this card, you are out of the round.
